name: Chesty the Treasure
description:
You’ve all played as the knight looking for treasure in a creepy dungeon. Some of you even played as the monsters guarding this great treasure.

Now, get ready to play AS the treasure!

In Chesty the Treasure, you play as a little chest with one goal - get the coins before the knights do! Watch out however, as the knights have a tendency to forget about their honour and steal your coins! Also, did I forget to mention that your life is meaningless without any treasure inside you, so you die when you run out of coins? Well, now you know!

Let’s see if you can reach the secret level!!
